=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 10, col = 13)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 10, col = 13)

The current position of the avatar has not changed since the last state, indicating that it might have rotated but not moved. Given this situation, I should consider different actions. 

Also, from the current state described, the avatar is positioned at (10, 13), which is right next to a box at (10, 12) on the left and the possibility of interacting with citizens at (12, 0) and (12, 1) below.

Since I want to avoid staying idle for too long and explore opportunities for obtaining points or interacting with the citizens:

``` Action:2 ``` 

I am choosing to move right to position (10, 14). This will allow me to explore that area further and possibly find strategic opportunities to interact with the citizens or other sprites.
